name: CEEE India
overview: The CEEE is a non-profit organisation which brings together students, academicians and professionals from all fields of engineering to collaborate on solutions promoting excellence in instruction, research, practice and public service. The Consortium of Engineers and Engineering Education (CEEE) is a professional engineering body in India. With great leaders supporting us, the consortium is a forward-looking, campaigning organization for the engineering fraternity. By working with leading companies, universities and think tanks, we create and share knowledge to provide governments, businesses, students, professionals, etc., with fresh thinking and authoritative guidance on all the aspects of engineering. The CEEE is a platform for individuals and institutions committed to furthering education in engineering at home and overseas. We find and nurture new talent, helping engineers build their skills and careers in the field of engineering and related areas of science and technology that underlines modern civilization. We provide solutions to professionals through our recruitment services and also encourage and provide a platform for entrepreneurial ideas. Our medium of information is aptly placed through the use of advanced technology.
